summary: UI/UX update request: adjust user panel card typography/sizing, reduce card button sizes, and apply distinct colors to admin panel save/submit buttons and section tabs for clearer separation.
known_issues: User reports UI regression: user panel card titles/text and user/friend text became too small; admin save/submit buttons have no color; admin sections/tabs look merged without distinct colors.

existing_features.title: Update the User Dashboard KPI cards to match the provided screenshot by increasing the KPI title/body font sizes and slightly increasing KPI card vertical sizing (padding/spacing) so the three KPI cards are visually larger and easier to read.

Reduce the User Dashboard action-tile (4 tiles: Production/Work/Nasta/Payment-Loan) button size by approximately 10% while keeping the tile labels readable, and adjust tile typography so it is not overly small compared to the KPI section.

Increase 'user/friend' related text sizes across the user panel views so they are consistent with the larger dashboard section typography (restore readability similar to the previous section styling).

In the Admin panel, apply clear, distinct colors to the System Settings tabs (Branding, Label Edit, Notice, Admin, Section) so each tab/section is visually distinguishable (not appearing merged), matching the intent of the provided screenshot.

Add attractive, non-gray colors to Admin panel primary action buttons (Save/Submit/Add) in Settings and Rate sections, and audit other admin sections to ensure their primary action buttons are not colorless; choose cohesive colors that match the existing gradients/theme.

new_feature_requests.summary: Match user panel card title/body text sizes to the provided screenshot; make user/friend-related text larger like the previous section.
Resize user panel cards: make the top three cards slightly bigger and reduce the four card buttons by ~10%.
Admin panel: add visually distinct colors to save/submit buttons across sections (settings, rate, and others as needed), choosing suitable colors.
Admin panel: give each tab/section (Branding, Label Edit, Notice, Admin, Section) a different color so they are clearly distinguishable.

projectName: Restore user dashboard card sizing/typography and add distinct admin settings colors
